page.title: 19Woodthorpe N.F. & M. School
page.content: It is the fiftieth anniversary of {Woodthorpe School}this year. A new headteacher has joined the school this year, and the First and Middle School have amalgamated. This was because the school had become very small and there are lots of spare rooms.The schools are only about half the size they were 8 years ago ,because the birth rate went down in the 1970,s. Thre are two men and six women teachers in the Middle School, 10 lady teachers in the lower school plus a secretary and two assistants. Most children like doing swimming best. Nearly all the children can swim 25 metres before they leave the school. There are 163 children in the Middle Department of the school and 181 in the First Department.
